caption:
"A metallic possibly dispenser-type object with a dark gray finish and rectangular shape. Has a lever mechanism and a slot for dispensing items. Likely used for distributing paper towels or similar products. Mounted on a bathroom wall near a toilet and a door."

"A brown wooden door with a matte finish and rectangular shape. Features a metal handle and lock mechanism. Provides privacy and access control. Located in a bathroom setting, adjacent to a toilet and a radiator."
